code: import React from"react";import{Button,InputLabel,Select,MenuItem}from"@material-ui/core";import{Field}from"formik";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Step1=function Step1(props){if(props.currentStep!==1)return null;console.log(props.values);var step1Map=[{label:"Duration:",name:"duration",items:[3,6,12],itemsType:"Months"},{label:"Amount of gigabytes in a cloud:",name:"gigabytes",items:[3,5,10,20,30,50],itemsType:"GB"},{label:"Upfront payment:",name:"upfrontPayment",items:["Yes","No"],itemsType:""}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[step1Map.map(function(_ref){var label=_ref.label,name=_ref.name,items=_ref.items,itemsType=_ref.itemsType;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputLabel,{className:"input-label",children:label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{id:name,as:Select,className:"input-area",fullWidth:true,name:name,type:"number",defaultValue:props.values.name,children:items.map(function(value){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MenuItem,{value:value,children:[value," ",itemsType]});})})]});}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"footer-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"primary",variant:"contained",size:"medium",onClick:function onClick(){return props.setStep(2);},children:"Next"})})]});};export default Step1;
